name: Impinge Solutions
description: Impinge Solutions is a global IT services company which provides full-cycle services in areas of web design, web development, mobile app development, SEO, website hosting & support to clients around the globe. Combining our solid business domain experience, technical expertise, profound knowledge of latest industry trends and quality-driven delivery model we offer progressive end-to-end solutions.
